bibl.title: An Innovation in Annotated Codices on Papyrus.
bibl.note: Examines a group of twenty-seven annotated papyrus codices (Greek and Latin) which share a set of distinctive features not seen in other literary or subliterary texts.
bibl.seg: McNAMEE Kathleen, An Innovation in Annotated Codices on Papyrus.
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. II (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 669-678, 1 tabl.
Examines a group of twenty-seven annotated papyrus codices (Greek and Latin) which share a set of distinctive features not seen in other literary or subliterary texts.
